Last year Amazon's federal income tax rate was zero. That was apparently too much for my Republican colleagues. Under the Trump tax bill, Amazon will get an additional $789 million tax break on the profits they shifted to offshore tax havens. https://itep.org/amazon-inc-paid-zero-in-federal-taxes-in-2017-gets-789-million-windfall-from-new-tax-law/

Cities with the toughest gun laws often have the highest murder and crime rates.

Want to see crime take off? Disarm law-abiding citizens.

You know what does work to decrease gun crime? Targeting violent criminals. #CPAC2018

Fighting to end the gun violence epidemic is about more than politics — it’s just the right thing to do. I haven’t forgotten the lives lost at Sandy Hook or in San Bernardino or last week at Stoneman Douglas High School. Let’s get this done and keep our communities safe.

Guess who's profiting, though? The Koch Brothers, corporate donors and the top 1% shipping jobs overseas. 

They're hoping you're distracted and falling for the Republican lies. Don't let them win. #ThursdayThoughts #GOPTaxScam

Today marks Asian American Women’s Equal Pay Day, the symbolic date when Asian American women’s earnings on average “catch up” to non-Hispanic white men’s earnings from the previous year. #AAPIEqualPay
The #WageGap and a lack of #paidleave drive racial and gender disparities that rob many from contributing their talent and innovation to the workforce.  #AAPIEqualPay
It’s worth noting as part of tax reform, we repealed the Obamacare individual mandate, but we need to go back at it and repeal the disaster that is Obamacare. #CPAC2018
Few things have been more frustrating than seeing Republicans come short on repealing Obamacare. #CPAC2018
